documents.document: @spratters53 I was just laughing at the sheets 😜

Haven't really been following wrestling for about a year now, but I've kept an eye on things. Seems like the #RoyalRumble is gonna be good

Just finished #ResidentEvil7 . Great game, bad ending.

@kensutz haven't been brace enough to go with the headset yet but darkened room is a must!
Spent 20 mins with RE7 last night. In that time, I had my hand chopped off, re-attached, and ran over an old man with a car. Best game ever.
I'll never stop laughing https://t.co/BncYB7KWCr

@DKShadow all crossed! Like the new profile pic by the way 😄
@DKShadow that usually means yes....or "leave us alone" 🤣

@ZQuestion I love the series, so I know I'll be happy. And based on the trophy list, the mini games sound really fun
@ZQuestion looking forward to trying it after Tuesday
Just watched The Girl on the Train. Great movie.
@PlatinumHunt congrats, nice one to have 😄

@spratters53 hmph, fine 😤
@spratters53 @EyeAintReal it's actually "I've been meaning to play DS2 and this is an opportunity to start" but fine 😜
@spratters53 PS3 or PS4? Need a partner? 😄
@_RayneScar oh god the wheezing. I had forgotten about it since it's been months since I lifted! Having Vietnam flashbacks now 😛
@_RayneScar it really is. Means you can grunt in peace 😜
@_RayneScar same. I keep a set of weights in the house and a box for box jumps
@_RayneScar nah, I mean yeah fuck em, but I prefer to run, because at least I don't finish feeling like shit, which would happen in a gym
@_RayneScar that's why I run instead of using gyms. My anxiety couldn't handle it
@sedateinfect ah ok. He also changed the header photo that was of Obama's inauguration 😄
@sedateinfect does he not just retain Obamas followers? Same account?

And so it begins. Not with a bang but with a whimper.

@Shiffty25 ...you do know I didn't make this image right?

@Vyprstryke right here, what's up?

@TheMasterPrawn 2 years work, on and off. Just needed the 8 jumps and 15 different moves in one combo and got it in 45 minutes, lucky run
